name: Maze Runner (itch) (NeutralFace177)
description:
PLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

Press Esc to open options, enable show minutes seperatly for the timer to work

Close menu then go into fullscreen so it isnt cut off

Prototype for a maze runner game. It will be based off the first movie, with your goal being to escape the maze. 

Right now the maze is static, later it will be more like in the movie.
